data.lore: The intrepid young adventurer Ezreal has explored some of the most remote and abandoned locations on Runeterra. During an expedition to the buried ruins of ancient Shurima, he recovered an amulet of incredible mystical power. Likely constructed to be worn by one of the Ascended, the enormous talisman nonetheless fit snugly upon his arm, amplifying his raw sorcerous skill to such an extent that he's gained the reputation of a hero, much to his embarrassment.
data.name: Ezreal
data.title: the Prodigal Explorer

spells.tooltip:
Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects).

Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by 1 second if Mystic Shot hits a target.
spells.description: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1 second if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a2 }}) physical damage (applies on-hit effects). Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by 1 second if Mystic Shot hits a target.
spells.name: Mystic Shot
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1 second if it strikes an enemy unit.

spells.tooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.
spells.description: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by {{ e2 }}% for 5 seconds.
spells.name: Essence Flux
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.

spells.tooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
spells.description: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt at the nearest enemy unit, dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage.
spells.name: Arcane Shift
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.

spells.tooltip: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).
spells.description: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
spells.sanitizedTooltip: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a barrage of missiles dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ f1 }}) (+{{ a1 }}) magic damage to each unit it passes through. However, it deals {{ e2 }}% less damage for each unit it hits (minimum {{ e3 }}%).
spells.name: Trueshot Barrage
spells.sanitizedDescription: Ezreal channels for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).

passive.name: Rising Spell Force
passive.description: Hitting a target with any of Ezreal's abilities increases his Attack Speed by 10% for 5 seconds (effect stacks up to 5 times).
passive.sanitizedDescription: Hitting a target with any of Ezreal's abilities increases his Attack Speed by 10% for 5 seconds (effect stacks up to 5 times).
